ch0357_00_suguri/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m glad I ran
into you today.
ch0357_00_suguri/0101_0701_02_10:
What’re you up to later? If you don’t have
any plans, wanna have a battle?
ch0357_00_suguri/7101_0701_01_10: The school I go to, Blueberry Academy...
ch0357_00_suguri/7101_0701_02_10:
It specializes in teaching students about
Pokémon battles.
ch0357_00_suguri/7101_0701_03_10:
If you’re thinking about going there, I’ll be
the first to welcome you!
ch0357_00_suguri/7101_0701_04_10: I’d love to have more rivals.
ch0357_00_suguri/7102_0701_01_10:
These Poryphones people use on Pasio...
This is the first time I’ve had a smartphone,
so I’m pretty excited!
ch0357_00_suguri/7102_0701_02_10:
But there are lots of apps and stuff, so I’m
still getting used to it all.
ch0357_00_suguri/7102_0701_03_10:
One of these days...y’know, if you’ve got
the time...maybe you could show me how
to use it?
ch0357_00_suguri/7103_0701_01_10:
At the academy, when I was living in a
dorm, I didn’t pay much attention to what
I ate.
ch0357_00_suguri/7103_0701_02_10:
Eating chocolate all the time probably wasn’t
too good for me.
ch0357_00_suguri/7103_0701_03_10:
But maybe I can have a more balanced diet
here on Pasio, since there’s food here from
all over the world.
ch0357_00_suguri/7104_0701_01_10:
I put my hair up so I can let loose during
battles.
ch0357_00_suguri/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s hard to explain...but I guess it helps
me focus.
ch0357_00_suguri/7104_0701_03_10:
My sis makes fun of me about it, though.
She says I’m trying to be edgy and that it’s
too cute.
ch0357_00_suguri/7105_0701_01_10:
I, uh...always have a lot of fun when you’re
around, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0357_00_suguri/7105_0701_02_10: So, I...I want to keep being good friends!
ch0357_00_suguri/1701_0701_01_10:
I wanna give you something,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], but I dunno
what.
ch0357_00_suguri/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m glad I had something to give you. It’d be
way better if you had it!
ch0357_00_suguri/2501_0701_01_10:
Kitakami is usually quiet, but for a few days,
during the Festival of Masks, it gets pretty
lively.
ch0357_00_suguri/2501_0701_02_10:
Of all the food they’ve got at the stalls, the
candy apples are my favorite!
ch0357_00_suguri/2501_0701_03_10:
I love ’em! And you can only get them
during the festival!
ch0357_00_suguri/2501_0702_01_10:
Kitakami doesn’t have all the fancy things
Pasio does...
ch0357_00_suguri/2501_0702_02_10: but it’d be awesome if you visited sometime!
ch0357_00_suguri/2511_0701_01_10:
There was a time when I was obsessed with
getting stronger.
ch0357_00_suguri/2511_0701_02_10:
There was someone I wanted to beat,
no matter what it took.
ch0357_00_suguri/2511_0701_03_10:
But I realized getting stronger just for
strength’s sake wasn’t good.
ch0357_00_suguri/2511_0701_04_10:
If we’re going to get stronger, it should be
to have more fun in Pokémon battles.
ch0357_00_suguri/2511_0702_01_10:
You and me should have a serious battle
sometime!
ch0357_00_suguri/2511_0702_02_10: If we both go all out, I promise it’ll be fun!
ch0357_00_suguri/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You’re up early. I’m heading out to
do some training soon. Wanna join me?
ch0357_00_suguri/3003_0701_01_10:
Now that I’ve had lunch, I’m getting sleepy
all of a sudden. Wanna take a break?
ch0357_00_suguri/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s easy to get lost at night in unfamiliar
places. Maybe you should avoid going out
too much now that it’s dark.
